title: 开服出现问题
author: qiguanjie110
txt_content:
Invalid maximum heap size: -Xmx4G
The specified size exceeds the maximum representable size.
Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine.
Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
qiguanjie110 发表于 2020-5-21 15:15
Invalid initial heap size: -Xms4G
The specified size exceeds the maximum representable size.
Error ...
那就把  -Xms4G 也删除

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
尝试把启动参数中的  -Xmx4G 改为   -Xmx2G

若还不行，卸载之前安装的所有 java ，安装这个 https://download.mcbbs.net/java/jre_x64.exe
